comments:
I receive an error in Eclipse 3.2 the second time an ant build script (which has an import task) is opened.

Steps to reproduce:
Open an ant build script that uses the import task
close all ant editors
open any other build script which has an import task
The following error will appear in the editor:

Unable to create this part due to an internal error. Reason for the failure: org.apache.xerces.parsers.XML11Configuration

(see stack trace at the bottom)

Notes:
100% reproducible
Appears to only happen on build scripts with an import task, all other build scripts are unaffected.
Does not happen if the import task references a file that does not exist
Only happens after the all the open ant editors have been closed


Stack trace:

Thank you for the bug report.
This is a known problem that we will be working to fix in 3.3.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 143008 ***
